system.description: You can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.vemj08hawvmf44ya]{disguise self} once per long rest. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.250c4t64865s83si]{blur} once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.eceeym81z9dq6r58]{major image} once per long rest. You don’t need material components for these spells, and when casting them your spellcasting ability is Intelligence or Wisdom (whichever is higher).
